command: if [ -x "$(command -v curl)" ]; then curl http://localhost:9090/-/healthy; elif [ -x "$(command -v wget)" ]; then wget -q -O /dev/null http://localhost:9090/-/healthy; else exit 1; fi
if [ -x "$(command -v curl)" ]; then curl http://localhost:9090/-/ready; elif [ -x "$(command -v wget)" ]; then wget -q -O /dev/null http://localhost:9090/-/ready; else exit 1; fi
